attributes.action: only permit the sale of council house property to tenants at a reduced value, with a guaranteed option for the council to repurchase an the same discounted rate of market value.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: only permit the sale of council house property to tenants at a reduced value, with a guaranteed option for the council to be offered first refusal for the repurchase of the property at the equivalent discounted rate.  For example, a council property (value £100,000) sold to a tenant at a reduced rate of 60% where it is purchased for £60,000, if valued in future years for £150,000 and is offered for sale then it must be offered to the council for £90,000.  This guarantees the purchaser the appropriate return on their investments, and also enables the councils to maintain council owned property for alternative tenants in need of a council owned home.
